name: @commercetools/typescript-sdk
description: Typescript definitions and sdk for commercetools platform
author: Beniasaad Achraf <achraf.beniasaad@commercetools.com> (https://github.com/acbeni)

scripts.prebuild: rimraf -rf lib && babel ./src --out-dir lib --extensions '.ts' --config-file './babel.config.js' && tsc --project tsconfig.types.json
scripts.build: cross-env npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f umd -n TypescriptSdk -i lib/index.js -o lib/typescript-sdk.umd.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f umd -n TypescriptSdk -i lib/index.js -o lib/typescript-sdk.umd.min.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f es -n TypescriptSdk -i lib/index.js -o lib/typescript-sdk.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f cjs -n TypescriptSdk -i lib/index.js -o lib/typescript-sdk.cjs.js
